flawed_nl_solution:
Jessa had 7 + 3 = <<7+3=13>>13 bills before she gave 3 to Geric.
Kyla had 13 - 2 = <<13-2=11>>11 bills.
So, Geric had 11 x 2 = <<11*2=22>>22 bills.
#### 22

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
